thread.title: Sharjah Civil Defence uses crane to 'rescue' 300kg man
thread.title_full: Sharjah Civil Defence uses crane to 'rescue' 300kg man

title: Sharjah Civil Defence uses crane to 'rescue' 300kg man
text: (Instagram) He had fallen ill. An overweight man in UAE had to be 'rescued' from his home in Sharjah, using a crane. Weighing at 300 kilograms, Sharjah Civil Defence had to use a crane to lift the 38-year-old out of his home so that he could be shifted to a hospital for treatment. Colonel Sami Al Naqbi, Director of Sharjah Civil Defence, said the patient was removed from his bed through the window of his family apartment. Ministry of Interior posted this photo of the rescue operation on Instagram A photo posted by Ministry Of Interior- UAE (@moiuae) on Feb 7, 2017 at 3:51am PST Afkar Abdullah
